title: CryptoDeivid
author: CryptoDeivid
created_time: November 21, 2023, 06:10:10 PMLast edit: November 21, 2023, 06:23:29 PM by CryptoDeivid
content: Changpeng Zhao, the CEO of Binance, has just resigned and pleaded guilty to money laundering. What repercussions will there be on cryptocurrencies in terms of their value?I leave a link to the news:https://twitter.com/search?q=binance+ceo+resigns&ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Esearchhttps://watcher.guru/news/changpeng-zhao-resigns-as-binance-ceo

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Already existing thread: Changpeng Zhao (CZ) has resigned as Binance CEO.Another: BREAKING NEWS: Changpeng Zhao (CZ) resigns as Binance CEOBest to lock this thread to avoid repetition.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: The best is to lock this thread. Just scroll down this thread, you will see lock topic at the left lower side, beside move topic. Just to avoid repetitive posts.

comments.author: CryptoDeivid
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on November 21, 2023, 06:17:42 PMThe best is to lock this thread. Just scroll down this thread, you will see lock topic at the left lower side, beside move topic. Just to avoid repetitive posts.how Can I delete it?

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoDeivid on November 21, 2023, 06:19:20 PMhow Can I delete it?You can just lock the thread instead. But if you insist on deleting it which is also good, at the lower right part of the post, you will see 'report to moderator '. Edit the topic to 'del' or 'delete' and report it to moderator for deletion. But even if you will report it to be deleted, also lock the thread.
